sense.name: withhold, keep
sense.commentary: Note: "reserved" used as a modifier should be tagged as 'X', e.g. "He is kind but reserved" or "Get the sugar reserved as a topping"
sense.examples: Please reserve your applause until the end of the performance. I reserve the right to remain silent. Drain the cherries, reserving the juice. The USGS has reserved a licensing fee from the city of Wichita. That sort of language should be reserved for the locker room.

sense.name: book, register for
sense.examples: He reserved a candlelit table for two. You have to reserve rooms months in advance! Please reserve me 3 tickets for the front row.
